title: App Config Feature Flags - useMLB and useTrafficSplitting are set to FALSE
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the "useMLB" feature flag in the PS5 config is set to "false"
AND the "useTrafficSplitting" feature flag in the PS5 config is set to "false"
custom_steps: WHEN the PS5 app is launched
custom_expected:
THEN a graphql/bamgrid network call will be made
AND a "traffic" network call will NOT be made
AND "MLB SDK Init" will NOT show up in the browser console log

title: App Config Feature Flags - useMLB TRUE and useTrafficSplitting FALSE
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the "useMLB" feature flag in the PS5 config is set to "true"
AND the "useTrafficSplitting" feature flag in the PS5 config is set to "false"
custom_steps: WHEN the PS5 app is launched
custom_expected:
THEN a graphql/bamgrid network call will NOT be made
AND a "traffic" network call will NOT be made
AND "MLB SDK Init" will show up in the browser console log

title: App Config Feature Flags - useMLB FALSE and useTrafficSplitting TRUE
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the "useMLB" feature flag in the PS5 config is set to "false"
AND the "useTrafficSplitting" feature flag in the PS5 config is set to "true"
custom_steps: WHEN the PS5 app is launched
custom_expected:
THEN a "traffic" network call will be made

**NOTE:**
Depending on the traffic splitting service configuration, it could be pointing to DSS or MLB

title: Anonymous user returns an experience
custom_steps: WHEN an anonymous user launches the app
custom_expected:
THEN the traffic splitting service is called
AND an experience is returned

title: Logged in user returns an experience
custom_steps: WHEN a logged in user launches the app
custom_expected:
THEN the traffic splitting service is called 
AND an experience is returned

custom_steps: WHEN an overridden user logs into the app
custom_expected: THEN the user should receive the MLB experience

custom_steps: WHEN an overridden user logs into the app
custom_expected: THEN the user should receive the Legacy experience

custom_steps: WHEN an overridden user logs into the app
custom_expected: THEN the user should receive the MLB experience

custom_steps: WHEN an overridden user logs into the app
custom_expected: THEN the user should receive the Legacy experience

OS = Override Service
AT = Adobe Target
Overridden user - adobemlbboth@gmail.com / Password23
custom_steps: WHEN an overridden user logs into the app

OS = Override Service
AT = Adobe Target

custom_steps: WHEN an overridden user logs into the app

title: Non-overridden user receives the Legacy experience
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is not overridden in Override Service or Adobe Target
custom_steps: WHEN a non-overridden user logs into the app
custom_expected: THEN the user should receive the Legacy experience

title: MLB experience does not call BAMSDK
custom_preconds: MLB user: adobemlb@gmail.com / Password23
custom_steps: WHEN a user is using the MLB experience
custom_expected:
THEN no calls are made via the BAMSDK (https://*.bamgrid.com/*/graphql)
AND calls are made via the Media-Gateway (https://media-gateway.mlb.com/graphql)

title: Legacy experience does not call Media Gateway
custom_preconds: Legacy user: adobelegacy@gmail.com / Password23
custom_steps: WHEN a user is using the Legacy experience
custom_expected:
THEN no calls are made via the Media-Gateway (https://media-gateway.mlb.com/graphql)
AND calls are made via the BAMSDK (https://*.bamgrid.com/*/graphql)

title: Closed Captions
custom_expected:
1. Users can enable or disable closed captions on the video player using quick action button

2. Closed captions display properly when enabled in the video player for an extended amount of time

3. Closed captioning will remain enabled or disabled on new video playback based on user's previous selection

title: Live playback from Hero - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_expected:
1. Users can launch a live stream from the Watch Now Hero

2. Video playback launch from Hero will begin at the live point if hide scores are NOT enabled

title: Live playback from Hero - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_expected:
1. Users can launch a live stream from the Watch Now Hero

2. Video playback launch from Hero will begin at the beginning if hide scores are enabled

title: Live playback from Games carousel
custom_expected: Users can launch a live stream from a game carousel

title: Full live game playback
custom_expected:
1. Video player gracefully closes once user watches game in full

2. Extended playback of live game from beginning to end has no issues

title: Pre-broadcast slate
custom_expected: "Event will begin shortly" slate is displayed before broadcast if stream has yet to start

title: Post-broadcast slate
custom_expected: "Thank you for Watching" slate is displayed after broadcast if stream has ended

title: Watch Live
custom_expected: Watch live option in the options menu after selecting the away/home feed will always start video playback at the live point

title: Resume
custom_expected: Resume option in the options menu after selecting the away/home feed will always start video playback at the bookmarked point

title: Watch from Beginning
custom_expected: Watch From Beginning option in the options menu after selecting the away/home feed will always start video playback at the beginning of the stream

title: Dismiss video player
custom_expected: Selecting O button on the video player or Pressing device's back button (Remote as well) will dismiss the live video player

title: Scrubber - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_expected: Hide spoilers ON will hide game stats, games scores, and scrubber markers if watching behind the live point

title: Scrubber - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_expected: Hide spoilers OFF will not hide game stats, games scores, and scrubber markers if watching behind the live point

title: Jump to Live
custom_expected: "Jump to Live" is available as a quick action button and sends user to the live point

title: FF/RW
custom_expected: Fast Forward/Rewind options are available on the video player as a quick action item

title: Play/Pause
custom_expected: Play/Pause options are available on the video player as a quick action item

title: Blackout
custom_expected: Users receive blackout messaging attempting to launch a game if in a territory blacked out from in-market regional games

title: Not Entitled
custom_expected:
1. Users receive non-entitled messaging when attempting to launch a game or stream that their account has no entitlements for

2. Users are given an option to purchase and upgrade their mlb.tv account if not-entitled to a stream

title: Audio from MLB app doesn't continue when switching to another app
custom_expected: New app's audio takes precedent over video player or audio player's live game audio

title: Broadcast metadata
custom_expected: Metadata for video feed selection and audio feed selection display as expected

title: Playback via Why Fy
custom_expected: User can stream video properly on WiFi without noticeable buffer

title: Scrubber game data (currently N/A)
custom_expected: Users see the correct player headshots in video player box score and gameday sections. If no headshot, a default silhouette is shown.

title: Alternate audio (currently N/A)
custom_expected:
1. Users can switch to alternate audio feeds when navigating to the broadcast options of the video player

2. Alternate audio feeds play properly for an extended amount of time

title: Broadcast switching (currently N/A)
custom_expected:
1. Users can switch to alternate video feeds when navigating to the broadcast options of the video player

2. Video feed options will be available in the feed selector which includes a home or away feed

title: Live playback from Gameday (currently N/A)
custom_expected: Users can launch a live stream from Gameday

title: Game stats update in line score (currently N/A)
custom_expected: Game stats update properly in the box score for mobile or line score for Connected Devices.

title: Skipping via inning markers (currently N/A)
custom_expected: Users can move around in the game by selecting the scores in the innings markers/Game Details

title: Picture-in-picture (PIP) (currently N/A)
custom_expected:
1. Users are able to select the picture-in-picture option on the video player to minimize the live stream

2. Users are able to move the PiP mini player around the app and screen

3. Users are able to launch a new app or audio during PiP is enabled

4. Users are able to maximize their PiP video player by selecting the full-screen button

title: Final game state - Game Tile
custom_expected: "Final" text is seen on the Game tile in Games page for all the Archived games.

title: FF/RW
custom_expected: When fast forward or Rewind is pressed, then the video will scrubbed by 4x, 8x, 16x, 32x and an additional arrow will be shown in the FF/RW box.

title: Pause
custom_expected: When user presses pause or Ok button, then a pause icon will display in the middle of the screen and disappear after a second with the video still paused.

title: Unpause
custom_expected: Once video is Paused then press Play/Ok/Enter/Select button, the play button will appear in the middle of the screen then disappear after a second..

title: Closed Captions
custom_expected: Closed captions display properly when enabled in the video player for an extended amount of time

title: Closed Captions on subsequent playback
custom_expected: Closed captioning will remain enabled or disabled on new video playback based on user's previous selection

title: Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_expected: HideSpoilers-Off, When Archived Home or Away Video feed is selected then Video should start from the beginning.

title: Resume - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_expected: HideSpoilers-Off: When Archived Home or Away Video feed is selected, then Game watched for few mins, later exists and  launches the same game, then bookmarking should set and user should able to watch the game where he left if Resume option is selected from Feed select modal.

title: Game Tile - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_expected: When Archived game is selected with Hidespoilers -ON then the stats data on the game tile is hidden

title: Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_expected: HideSpoilers - ON, When Archived Home or Away Video feed is selected then Video should start from the beginning.

title: Playback via Why Fy
custom_expected: User can stream video properly on WiFi without noticeable buffer

title: Feed metadata - Feed Select
custom_expected: Metadata for video feed selection and audio feed selection display as expected

title: registerDevice is called for Anonymous users
custom_steps:
WHEN an anonymous user launches the app 
AND are in the MLB experience
custom_expected:
THEN clients should make a registerDevice request to Media-Gateway
AND can be verified by searching "graphql" in the Network tab of browser dev tools
AND "clientExperience", "deviceId", "entitlements", and "sessionId" are present in the "registerDevice" call
AND an "accessToken" is not present within "mlbAuth" in Redux

title: registerDevice is called for Free users
custom_preconds: GIVEN a free user is already logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a free user launches the app
AND are in the MLB experience
custom_expected:
THEN clients should make a registerDevice request to Media-Gateway
AND can be verified by searching "graphql" in the Network tab of browser dev tools
AND "clientExperience", "deviceId", "entitlements", and "sessionId" are present in the "registerDevice" call
AND an "accessToken" is present within "mlbAuth" in Redux

title: registerDevice is called for Paid users
custom_preconds: GIVEN a paid user is already logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a paid user launches the app
AND are in the MLB experience
custom_expected:
THEN clients should make a registerDevice request to Media-Gateway
AND can be verified by searching "graphql" in the Network tab of browser dev tools
AND "clientExperience", "deviceId", "entitlements", and "sessionId" are present in the "registerDevice" call
AND an "accessToken" is present within "mlbAuth" in Redux

title: registerDevice is called when logging out
custom_steps:
WHEN a user logs out of the app
AND are in the MLB experience
custom_expected:
THEN clients should make a registerDevice request to Media-Gateway
AND can be verified by searching "graphql" in the Network tab of browser dev tools
AND "clientExperience", "deviceId", "entitlements", and "sessionId" are present in the "registerDevice" call
AND an "accessToken" is not present within "mlbAuth" in Redux

title: registerDevice is called when logging in
custom_preconds: GIVEN an anonymous user launches the app
custom_steps:
WHEN the anonymous user logs in
AND are in the MLB experience
custom_expected:
THEN clients should make a registerDevice request to Media-Gateway
AND can be verified by searching "graphql" in the Network tab of browser dev tools
AND "clientExperience", "deviceId", "entitlements", and "sessionId" are present in the "registerDevice" call
AND an "accessToken" is present within "mlbAuth" in Redux

title: registerDevice passes device information
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user launches the app
custom_steps: WHEN registerDevice is called
custom_expected:
THEN the "graphql" type "xhr" Payload contains "operationName", "query", "variables"
AND "variables" contains "clientType", "device", "experience"
AND "device" contains "applicationRuntime", "attributes", "deviceFamily", "deviceLanguage", "deviceProfile", "knownDeviceId"
AND "attributes" contains "browserName", "browserVersion", "manufacturer", "model", "operatingSystem", "operatingSystemVersion"

title: Same session is resumed after app is backgrounded
custom_preconds:
**NOTE:** This must be tested on a kit through the Remote Inspector, as there is no way to invoke backgrounding through the browser. Can be confirmed via the Remote Inspector Console, "app/setIsBackgrounded", "next state", "experience", "MLB", "sessionId". Be sure to grab the sessionId when the app is open, before backgrounding.

GIVEN a user backgrounds their app for an hour
custom_steps: WHEN the user returns
custom_expected: THEN the previous session is resumed

title: Playback Expiration Handling
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user has initiated game playback, Live or Archive
AND the user pauses video playback
AND the user backgrounds the app for at least 24 hours
custom_steps:
WHEN a user returns to the app
AND initiates playback
custom_expected: THEN video playback resumes at the paused point

title: Archive Anonymous - Recap/Condensed Game
custom_preconds:
1. When an anonymous user launches the app and selects the archived Game, Feed select page appears with  Recap/Condensed option.

2. When an anonymous user selects the archived game, Feed Select page appear with Watch Free - Condensed Game and Recap and Full game access - Get MLB.TV and Login.

title: Archive Free User - Recap/Condensed Game
custom_preconds: When a Free user select archived game, Feed Select modal should appear with Watch Free: Condensed Game and Recap or for full game access to upgrade to MLB.TV button.

title: Archive STP User - Recap/Condensed Game
custom_preconds: When a Single Team user selects Archived game, Feed Select modal should appear with Condensed Game and Recap option, along with Audio and Video feeds with a lock symbol for any feed the user doesn't have access to.

title: Live Anonymous - Subscription options
custom_preconds: When an anonymous user selects the Live game, Feed Select modal should appear with subscription options. For Full game access, click on Get MLB.TV and Login

title: Live Free User - Subscription options
custom_preconds: When a Free user select LIVE game, Feed Select modal should appear with an upgrade option in order to watch the live game.
custom_expected: Feed buttons with lock icons display, and user is directed to the subscriptions page after selecting one of the feed buttons.

title: Scheduled/Postponed No Broadcast Available
custom_preconds:
1. When an anonymous user launches the app and selects Postponed game,Feed Select page should appear  stating "This game has no available feed at this time" message.

2. When a logged in user launches the app and selects Postponed game, Feed Select page should appear  stating "This game has no available feed at this time" message.

**NOTE:** Have not specifically implemented this, but feed buttons with lock icons are displayed, and the user is taken to the subscriptions page after selecting a feed button.

title: Live FGotD Anonymous
custom_preconds:
When an anonymous user launches the app and selects the LIVE FGOD Game,Feed Select page should appear that allows the user to choose to Create free account or Login.

**NOTE:** Have not specifically implemented this, but feed buttons with lock icons are displayed, and the user is taken to the subscriptions page after selecting a feed button.

custom_preconds: When a Audio user select Live FGOD game, Feed Select modal should appear with Audio and Video feeds

title: Live FGotD Free user
custom_preconds: When a Free user select LIVE FGOD game,Feed Select modal should appear and that allows the user to choose Audio/Video feed to watch.

**NOTE:** Have not specifically implemented this, but feed buttons with lock icons are displayed, and the user is taken to the subscriptions page after selecting a feed button.

title: Archive FGotD AtBat user
custom_preconds: When a Audio user select Archived FGOD game, Feed Select modal should appear with Audio and Video feeds

title: Archive FGotD Free user
custom_preconds: When a Free user select archived FGOD game,Feed Select modal should appear and that allows the user to choose Audio/Video feed to watch.

title: Archive FGotD Anonymous Condensed Game and Recap
custom_preconds: When an anonymous user launches the app and selects the Archived FGOD Game, Feed select modal appears with Watch Free - Condensed and Recap, Full game access - Create Free Account or Log In buttons

custom_preconds:
When an anonymous user selects SVOD/SLIVE,Feed Select modal should appear that has the title of the video and two buttons to either Get MLB.TV or Login

**Behavior as of 7/13/23:** Directs to paywall after selecting the SVOD/SLIVE tile or "Watch" button in the Hero

**Behavior as of 7/13/23:** Directs to paywall after selecting the SVOD/SLIVE tile or "Watch" button in the Hero

title: Live Entitled Secondary Feed Select Options
custom_preconds:
1. When a logged in user launches the app and selects Live Game,Feed select page appear with Audio and Video options and if any Video feed is selected, then second Feed select modal should appear with Watch Live/Start From Beginning Options

2. Users have an option to watch live videos from the beginning, resume, or live when attempting to launch a game

title: Archive Entitled
custom_preconds: When a logged in selects Archived Game,Feed Select modal should appear with Watch Free: Condensed Game and Recap/Video/Audio feeds

title: Entitled user Scheduled game
custom_preconds: When a logged in user launches  the app and selects Future Game, Feed select page appears with Youre a bit Early message.

title: Live Entitled Resume
custom_preconds: When a logged-in user select and play the Live Game for few mins, later exits the game and launches the same game, then Feed Select page should appear with Resume option.

title: National Feed Blackout
custom_preconds: When a logged in user launches  the app and selects Live National Blackout Game, Feed select page appears with Blackout message.

title: International Feed Blackout (Currently N/A, have not had DM5 International feeds)
custom_preconds: When a logged in user launches  the app and selects Live International Blackout Game, Feed select page appears with Blackout message.

title: AppleTV+ messaging
custom_preconds:
When a logged in user launches the app and selects Live Partner (Eg: Peacock, Apple TV, YouTube) Game, Feed select page appears with Blackout messaging on the game tiles that are in the "blackout market".
After 90 mins of the partner game completion, ensure the game tile follows the normal rules (ie if a user requires additional subscription show lock icon)

custom_preconds:
When a logged in user launches the app and selects Live Partner (Eg: Peacock, Apple TV, YouTube) Game, Feed select page appears with Blackout messaging on the game tiles that are in the "blackout market".
After 90 mins of the partner game completion, ensure the game tile follows the normal rules (ie if a user requires additional subscription show lock icon)

custom_preconds: When a logged in launches the app and selects Live game, user should see the "Postgame" text on the game tile for both or any one team until the text changes to Final.

custom_preconds: Video feed options will be available in the feed selector which includes a home or away feed

title: Hitting initPlaybackSession endpoint
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the ps5-config contains featureFlags->experience->useMLB:true

**NOTE**
Config was updated in PROD
custom_steps: WHEN live or archive game playback is initiated
custom_expected:
THEN graphql network call request url is media-gateway.mlb.com/graphql
AND the Payload tab for the graphql call contains operationName:"initPlaybackSession"
AND "playback" is a field in the "initPlaybackSession" response
AND the following fields are present in the request, "cdn", "expiration", "token", and "url"

title: Heartbeat service integration - video playback
custom_preconds:
**NOTE:** Test on a browser to see network traffic

GIVEN the Dev Settings Experience is set to "MLB"
AND the Dev Settings Environments is set to "beta"
AND Dev Tools are open with the Network tab selected
AND "playback-heartbeat" is entered in the search field of the Network tab
custom_steps: WHEN game playback is initiated, live or archive
custom_expected:
THEN data.initPlaybackSession.heartbeatInfo.url is invoked with a GET request every 60 seconds (Request URL: https://playback-heartbeat.mlb.com/...)
AND the heartbeat request url is not invoked after exiting the stream

title: Heartbeat service integration - video pause
custom_preconds:
NOTE: Test on a browser to see network traffic

GIVEN the Dev Settings Experience is set to "MLB"
AND the Dev Settings Environments is set to "beta"
AND Dev Tools are open with the Network tab selected
AND "playback-heartbeat" is entered in the search field of the Network tab
AND playback of a DM5 stream is initiated
custom_steps: WHEN game playback is paused, live or archive
custom_expected: THEN the heartbeat request url is not invoked while the stream is paused (Request URL: https://playback-heartbeat.mlb.com/...)

title: Heartbeat service integration - video resume
custom_preconds:
NOTE: Test on a browser to see network traffic

GIVEN the Dev Settings Experience is set to "MLB"
AND the Dev Settings Environments is set to "beta"
AND Dev Tools are open with the Network tab selected
AND "playback-heartbeat" is entered in the search field of the Network tab
AND playback of a DM5 stream is paused
custom_steps: WHEN game playback is resumed, live or archive
custom_expected: THEN the heartbeat should resume with the same playbackSessionId (Request URL: https://playback-heartbeat.mlb.com/...)

title: Heartbeat service integration - video dismiss
custom_preconds:
NOTE: Test on a browser to see network traffic

GIVEN the Dev Settings Experience is set to "MLB"
AND the Dev Settings Environments is set to "beta"
AND Dev Tools are open with the Network tab selected
AND "playback-heartbeat" is entered in the search field of the Network tab
AND playback of a DM5 stream is initiated
custom_steps: WHEN a user dismisses game playback, live or archive
custom_expected: THEN the heartbeat request url is not invoked after exiting the stream (Request URL: https://playback-heartbeat.mlb.com/...)

title: 5 devices don't trip concurrency
custom_preconds: Given the same user is signed into 5 devices, then the user can successfully stream on the 5 devices

title: 6 devices do trip concurrency
custom_preconds: Given the same user is signed into 6 devices, then the user will receive a user-friendly error that states they have hit the concurrency cap

title: No broadcast start milestone Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is set to OFF
AND a stream is mediaState=MEDIA_ON before the start of the game broadcast
AND the user has not previously played the video feed/stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a team video feed/stream
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN Playback starts at the beginning of the stream
AND the scrubber playhead is at the furthest left position on AND the scrubber bar
AND the elapsed time in the scrubber starts at 00:00

title: Broadcast start milestone Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is set to OFF
AND a game is live after the start of the game broadcast
AND the user has not previously played the video feed/stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a team video feed/stream
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the beginning of the game broadcast
AND the scrubber playhead is in the middle of the scrubber bar
AND the scrubber bar is blue to the left of the playhead
AND the scrubber bar is gray to the right of the playhead
AND the elapsed time in the scrubber is not 00:00

title: No broadcast start milestone Resume bookmark Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is set to OFF
AND a stream is mediaState=MEDIA_ON before the start of the game broadcast
AND a resume bookmark is saved before the game broadcast start
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a team video feed/stream
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN Playback starts at the beginning of the stream
AND the scrubber playhead is at the furthest left position on the scrubber bar
AND the elapsed time in the scrubber starts at 00:00

title: Broadcast start milestone Resume bookmark Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is set to OFF
AND a game is live after the start of the game broadcast
AND the user has previously played the video feed/stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a team video feed/stream
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the beginning of the game broadcast
AND the scrubber playhead is in the middle of the scrubber bar
AND the scrubber bar is blue to the left of the playhead
AND the scrubber bar is gray to the right of the playhead
AND the elapsed time in the scrubber is not 00:00

title: Resume bookmark after game broadcast start Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is set to OFF
AND a team feed/stream is mediaState=MEDIA_ON
AND the live point is before the game broadcast start time
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts watching at the live point, before the game broadcast start time
AND the user exits the feed/stream at any point after the top of the 1st inning
AND the user selects the same feed/stream again
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN playback will start at the game broadcast start point, before the top of the 1st inning
AND inning markers are displayed to the right of the playhead

title: No broadcast start milestone Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is set to ON
AND a stream is mediaState=MEDIA_ON before the start of the game broadcast
AND the user has not previously played the video feed/stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a team video feed/stream
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button
custom_expected:
THEN Playback starts at the beginning of the stream
AND the scrubber playhead is at the furthest left position on AND the scrubber bar
AND the elapsed time in the scrubber starts at 00:00

title: Broadcast start milestone Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback

AND the user has not previously played the video feed/stream

AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button

AND the scrubber bar is blue to the left of the playhead
AND the scrubber bar is gray to the right of the playhead
AND the elapsed time in the scrubber is not 00:00

title: Resume bookmark after game broadcast start Start from the beginning - Hide Spoilers ON

AND the live point is before the game broadcast start time

AND the user selects the same feed/stream again
AND the user selects the "Start From The Beginning" button

AND inning markers are not displayed in the scrubber bar

title: Live point before 1st inning - Hide Spoilers OFF

GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ON
AND the game has not started the 1st inning

AND the live point is before the 1st inning
AND the user continues watching the entire game
custom_expected:

AND the top of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing up, left of the inning number
AND the bottom on the inning is identified with a triangle pointing down, left of the inning number

title: Live point after top of the 1st inning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ON
AND the game is in progress past the top of the first inning
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts watching at the live point
AND the live point is after the top of the 1st inning
AND the user continues watching the entire game
custom_expected:
THEN inning markers are displayed to the left of the playback head for innings that have already occurred
AND inning markers are displayed in the scrubber bar as each half inning begins
AND the top of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing up, left of the inning number
AND the bottom of the inning is identified with a triangle pointing down, left of the inning number

title: Resume bookmark after the top of the 1st inning - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF
AND team feeds are mediaState=MEDIA_ON
AND a team feed/stream has a resume bookmark after the top of the 1st inning
custom_steps:
WHEN the user resumes the same game feed/stream before the game is Final
AND the user watches the game for at least a half inning
custom_expected:
THEN inning markers display to the left of the playback head for the portion of the game the user watched previously
AND inning markers display to the right of the playback head for the portion of the game that has occurred, but the user has not watched
AND inning markers are populated to the far right in the scrubber bar as each half inning begins

title: **REVIEW** Live point Skip through inning markers - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is turned OFF

AND the user is watching at the live point

AND the user selects each top and bottom inning in the line score

AND game playback matches the inning marker

title: Home video broadcast audio
custom_expected: Home team's video player game stream is matched with home team's broadcast audio

title: Away video broadcast audio
custom_expected: Away team's video player game stream is matched with away team's broadcast audio

title: Live ad break start
custom_expected: DAI ads playback for a Live game when an ad-break starts

title: Archive ad break start
custom_expected: DAI ads playback for an archive game when an ad-break starts

title: Live ad break pause
custom_expected: DAI ads playback is paused for a Live game when an ad break is paused

title: Archive ad break pause
custom_expected: DAI ads playback is paused for an archive game when an ad break is paused

title: Live playback starts in middle of ad break
custom_expected: Verifying ads playback when game playback starts in the middle of an ad break (live feed)

title: Archive playback starts in middle of ad break
custom_expected: Verifying ads playback when game playback starts in the middle of an ad break (archive feed)

title: Ad break handles network connection issue
custom_expected:
Verify platform behavior is as expected when network connection is lost during an ad break

Verify platform behavior is as expected when network connection is reestablished during an ad break

title: Ads don't play during game (archive)
custom_expected: DAI ads do not playback once the ad break ends, and game playback is resumed (archive game)

title: Ads don't play during game (live)
custom_expected: DAI ads do not playback once the ad break ends, and game playback is resumed (live game)

title: Ad playback resumed after unpaused (live)
custom_expected: DAI ads playback is resumed for a live game when playback is unpaused during an ad break

title: Ad playback resumed after unpaused (archive)
custom_expected: DAI ads playback is resumed for an archive game when playback is unpaused during an ad break

title: FF doesn't initiate during Ad break at live point
custom_expected: Verify if the user cannot FF the Ad during ad break on Game Live point

title: RW does initiate during Ad break at live point
custom_expected: Verify if the user can REW/ Pause the Ad during ad break on Game Live point

title: FF and RW during an ad break (archive)
custom_expected: Verify if the user can Rew, FF, Pause during the AD break and Archived games

title: DAI calls stop/fail when network connection is lost
custom_expected: Verify DAI calls stop/fail when network connection is lost during an ad Break, and DAI calls can be made after network connection is resumed
